description.zh-cn: 一份由中国知识分子、维权人士、异见人士等各界人士于2008年发起的宣言，旨在促进中国民主化、改善人权状况，并提出建立中华联邦共和国的构想。
description.en: A declaration initiated in 2008 by Chinese intellectuals, rights activists, dissidents, and others from various sectors, aiming to promote democratization and improve human rights in China, and proposing the establishment of a Federal Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、文学评论家、人权活动家，《零八宪章》的发起人之一，2010年诺贝尔和平奖得主。
description.en: A Chinese writer, literary critic, human rights activist, one of the initiators of Charter 08, and the 2010 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，《零八宪章》的主要起草人之一。
description.en: A Chinese scholar and one of the main drafters of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克反体制运动的象征性文件。
description.en: A symbolic document of the anti-regime movement in Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，对《零八宪章》及其签署者采取了压制措施。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia that suppressed Charter 08 and its signatories.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央委员，赵紫阳的政治秘书，中国异见人士，《零八宪章》的首批签署者之一。
description.en: Former member of the CPC Central Committee, political secretary to Zhao Ziyang, Chinese dissident, and one of the first signatories of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，天安门母亲运动发起人之一，《零八宪章》的首批签署者之一。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, one of the founders of the Tiananmen Mothers movement, and one of the first signatories of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 《零八宪章》中提出的用于解决两岸及民族问题的政治构想。
description.en: A political concept proposed in Charter 08 to resolve cross-strait and ethnic issues.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国刑法中的一项罪名，常用于惩处异见人士。刘晓波因《零八宪章》被以此罪名判刑。
description.en: A crime under the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China, often used to punish dissidents. Liu Xiaobo was sentenced on this charge for his involvement with Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 授予刘晓波的诺贝尔和平奖，以表彰其为中国基本人权所进行的长期、非暴力的斗争。此举使《零八宪章》广为人知。
description.en: The Nobel Peace Prize awarded to Liu Xiaobo for his long and non-violent struggle for fundamental human rights in China. This award brought widespread attention to Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 捷克剧作家、思想家、政治家，天鹅绒革命的思想领袖之一，曾任捷克斯洛伐克及捷克共和国总统。
description.en: A Czech playwright, thinker, and politician, one of the intellectual leaders of the Velvet Revolution, who served as president of Czechoslovakia and the Czech Republic.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的中级人民法院，该法院判处刘晓波有期徒刑。
description.en: An intermediate people's court in Beijing, People's Republic of China, which sentenced Liu Xiaobo to prison.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会机关报《人民日报》社主办与出版的国际新闻报刊，对《零八宪章》持负面评价。
description.en: An international news tabloid published by the People's Daily, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. It holds a negative view of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 藏传佛教格鲁派的最高领袖，对《零八宪章》表示支持。
description.en: The supreme leader of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, who expressed support for Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 1979年台湾民主运动中的重要政治性刊物，一些评论员认为其对《零八宪章》有影响。
description.en: An important political magazine in Taiwan's democracy movement in 1979, which some commentators believe influenced Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家，汉学家，《零八宪章》的海外支持者。
description.en: A historian and sinologist, and an overseas supporter of Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 《零八宪章》是受捷克斯洛伐克反体制运动的象征性文件《七七宪章》启发而作。
description.en: Charter 08 was inspired by Charter 77, a symbolic document of the anti-regime movement in Czechoslovakia.

description.zh-cn: 负责起草《零八宪章》。
description.en: Was responsible for drafting Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 参与修改并作为首批签署人之一签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: Participated in revising and was among the first to sign Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 作为首批签署人之一签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: Signed Charter 08 as one of the first signatories.

description.zh-cn: 作为首批签署人之一签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: Signed Charter 08 as one of the first signatories.

description.zh-cn: 《零八宪章》提出建立中华联邦共和国来解决两岸问题及各民族问题。
description.en: Charter 08 proposed the establishment of a Federal Republic of China to resolve cross-strait and ethnic issues.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府禁止了与《零八宪章》相关的活动，并逮捕多名发起人。
description.en: The government of the People's Republic of China banned activities related to Charter 08 and arrested several of its initiators.

description.zh-cn: 在《零八宪章》发布前夕拘留刘晓波，并随后以“煽动颠覆国家政权罪”将其逮捕判刑，直至其在监禁中去世。
description.en: Detained Liu Xiaobo on the eve of Charter 08's release, and later arrested and sentenced him for 'inciting subversion of state power', until his death in custody.

description.zh-cn: 以“煽动颠覆国家政权罪”判处刘晓波有期徒刑11年，剥夺政治权利2年。
description.en: Sentenced Liu Xiaobo to 11 years in prison and 2 years' deprivation of political rights for 'inciting subversion of state power'.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波被以“涉嫌煽动颠覆国家政权”的罪名逮捕并最终判刑。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo was arrested and eventually sentenced on charges of 'suspicion of inciting subversion of state power'.

description.zh-cn: 因“为中国基本人权所进行的长期、非暴力的斗争”而授予刘晓波诺贝尔和平奖。
description.en: Awarded the Nobel Peace Prize to Liu Xiaobo for his 'long and non-violent struggle for fundamental human rights in China'.

description.zh-cn: 刘晓波获奖使得《零八宪章》在国际上广为人知。
description.en: Liu Xiaobo's award brought widespread international attention to Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 亲自将“人与人”（Homo Homini）人权奖授予《零八宪章》签署群体。
description.en: Personally presented the Homo Homini Award to the Charter 08 signatory group.

description.zh-cn: 在报道中称制定《零八宪章》属于“公然的违宪行为”。
description.en: Claimed in a report that the creation of Charter 08 was an 'overtly unconstitutional act'.

description.zh-cn: 对《零八宪章》表示了支持和赞赏。
description.en: Expressed support and admiration for Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 作为海外知名人士支持并签署了《零八宪章》。
description.en: As a prominent overseas figure, supported and signed Charter 08.

description.zh-cn: 一些评论员认为《零八宪章》的起草人士可能受到三十年前台湾民主运动（以《美丽岛》为代表）的启发。
description.en: Some commentators believe the drafters of Charter 08 may have been inspired by Taiwan's democracy movement from thirty years prior, represented by the Formosa Magazine.
